job.title: Principal Software Engineer - Data Science/Machine Learning/AI
job.industry: Financial Services,Information Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Our Product Engineering team is seeking a Principal Software Engineer to build GLG’s platform that matches companies around the world with the experts and professionals who can help them make well informed important decisions on demand.  Working on one of our self-organizing teams you’ll pair with other engineers, product managers, and users to set and achieve goals that will help GLG continue to define the future of work. GLG’s ability to utilize search and match to find the right individuals out of our network of 900,000+ for our client’s needs, is the foundation of our business. Your work will be supporting this crucial parts of our business in… We are a rapidly growing engineering organization with a lot of programmers and relatively few managers, and value results and flexibility over process and dogma. The Product Engineering team builds the platform technology that connects GLG’s clients to our experts. Our team of product software engineers and product managers are responsible for GLG’s technology initiatives and product development. GLG is the world’s insight network. Our clients rely on GLG’s global team to connect with powerful insight across fields from our network of 900,000+ experts (and the hundreds of new experts we recruit every day).  We serve thousands of the world’s best businesses, from Fortune 500 corporations to leading technology companies to professional services firms and financial institutions. We connect our clients to the world’s largest and most varied source of first-hand expertise, including executives, scientists, academics, former public-sector leaders, and the foremost subject matter specialists.  GLG’s industry-leading compliance framework allows clients to learn in a structured, auditable, and transparent way, consistent with their own internal compliance obligations and the highest professional ethical standards. Our compliance standards are a major competitive differentiator and key component of the company’s culture.  To learn more, visit www.GLGinsights.com.
